Package org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins

Class ColorSchemeTooltipLabelCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins.ColorSchemeTooltipLabelCallback
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TooltipLabelCallback
    final class ColorSchemeTooltipLabelCallback
extends Object
implements TooltipLabelCallback
    Custom tooltip labels callback.
    This callback solved the issue that the tooltip failed about the BarBorderWidth options set to a BarChart.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private TooltipLabelCallback getCallback​(IsChart chart)
      Searches for the user callback for a specific chart instance.
      If not found, returns null.
      (package private) TooltipLabelCallback getDelegatedCallback​(IsChart chart)
      Returns the delegated callback previously set by user.
      List<String> onAfterLabel​(IsChart chart, TooltipItem item)
      Returns text to render after an individual label.
      If returns null or empty list, it will be ignored.
      List<String> onBeforeLabel​(IsChart chart, TooltipItem item)
      Returns text to render before an individual label.
      This will be called for each item in the tooltip.
      If returns null or empty list, it will be ignored.
      List<String> onLabel​(IsChart chart, TooltipItem item)
      Returns text to render for an individual item in the tooltip.
      If returns null or empty list, it will be ignored.
      TooltipLabelColor onLabelColor​(IsChart chart, TooltipItem item)
      Returns the colors and borders to render for the tooltip item.
      If returns null, it will be ignored.
      TooltipLabelPointStyle onLabelPointStyle​(IsChart chart, TooltipItem item)
      Returns the point style to use instead of color boxes if usePointStyle is true.
      Default implementation uses the point style from the data set points.
      IsColor onLabelTextColor​(IsChart chart, TooltipItem item)
      Returns the colors for the text of the label for the tooltip item.
      If returns null, it will be ignored.
      (package private) void removeDelegatedCallback​(IsChart chart)
      Removes the delegated callback previously set by user.
      (package private) void setDelegatedCallback​(IsChart chart, TooltipLabelCallback delegatedCallback)
      Sets the delegated callback previously set by user.
